Package fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.core

Provides all core classes and method to do extraction and listing of mail boxes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EmbeddedStoreExtractor
    The Interface EmbeddedStoreExtractor.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    StoreElement
    StoreElement class for an element (file or message) that can be extracted For the moment there's only one sub-type which is StoreMessage, but this class could be used for creating StoreFile for extracting elements from zip, rar, gz... containers
    StoreExtractor
    Abstract factory class for operation context on a defined mailbox or mail file.
    StoreExtractorOptions
    StoreExtractorOptions class for all extraction options.
    StoreFolder
    Abstract class for a store content folder.
    StoreMessage
    Abstract class for store file which is a mail box message.
    StoreMessageAppointment
    Utility class to encapsulate appointment information.
    StoreMessageAttachment
    Utility class to encapsulate an attachment file with content and metadata.

Package fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.core Description

Provides all core classes and method to do extraction and listing of mail boxes.

It uses:

  • JavaMail to access IMAP, IMAPS, POP3 (GIMAP experimental) account and Thunderbird mbox directory or Eml,
    • and
  • libpst to access Outlook pst files,
  • apache POI HSMF to access msg files.
